title: Endowed Graduate Research Fund in Dance
description: To provide support for graduate students pursuing master of fine arts degrees in dance. Includes advancing strategic initiatives to support creative and scholarly research, project-related expenses, professional development and/or scholarships.
marketingContent: To provide support for graduate students pursuing master of fine arts degrees in dance. Includes advancing strategic initiatives to support creative and scholarly research, project-related expenses, professional development and/or scholarships.
